mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment_t ( pay_id, user_no, ticketing_no, pay_method, amount, pay_dt, pay_state ) VALUES ( #{payId}, #{userNo}, #{ticketingNo}, #{payMethod}, #{amount}, CURRENT_DATE, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT pay_id, user_no, ticketing_no, pay_method, amount, pay_dt, pay_state, cancel_dt, cancel_status FROM payment_t WHERE pay_id = #{payId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticketing_t ( ticketing_no, user_no, time_no, movie_no, ticket_dt, person_count ) VALUES ( #{ticketingNo}, #{userNo}, #{timeNo}, #{movieNo}, CURRENT_DATE, #{personCount} )
INSERT INTO occupied_seat_t ( occupied_seat_no, seat_code, seat_type_no, time_no, ticketing_no ) VALUES ( occupied_seat_seq.NEXTVAL, #{seatCode}, 2, #{timeNo}, #{ticketingNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT ticketing_no, user_no, time_no, movie_no, ticket_dt, person_count FROM ticketing_t WHERE ticketing_no = #{ticketingNo}
